healthMonitorResource.name: Health Resource to Monitor
healthMonitorResource.hint: Resource to monitor (DnD uses 'system.attributes.hp', CoC uses 'system.attribs.hp', Simple World-Building uses 'system.health')

useTokenName.name: Use Token Name
useTokenName.hint: For unlinked tokens, token name will be used. For linked tokens, prototype token name will be used.

hideNPCs.name: Hide NPC Health Log from Players
hideNPCs.hint: GM users can reveal chat messages to players using context menu

hideNPCname.name: Hide NPC Name
hideNPCname.hint: Replaces NPC name with text set below.

replacementName.name: Hidden NPC Name Replacement
replacementName.hint: If above setting is enabled, NPC name will be replaced with text entered here.

showGMonly.name: Display Health Monitor to GM Users only
showGMonly.hint: Chat messages can be revealed to players using context menu.

showToggle.name: Show Health Monitor Toggle
showToggle.hint: Temporarily disable Health Monitor by toggling off the control button on the token toolbar. The control button is only visible to GM users.

showRes.name: Show Damage Immunities, Resistances, and Vulnerabilities
showRes.hint: Other modules required for damage reduction automation.

trackMax.name: Show Changes to Max HP / Temp Max HP

trashIcon.name: Enable Health Monitor Chat Message Trash Icon
